main.name: PORTFOLIO
main.description: I am highly driven Business analyst and software engineer graduate  and i have high level of commitment when it comes to designing and developing software projects.I always believed in  a mission driven company, i am seeking for a IT internship or graduate programme opportunity in order to gain enough experience
main.bio: Tshepiso koloti is an upcoming software developer and Business analyst who believes in the art of Technology organization. He is a recent graduate from the Tshwane University Of Technology and focused on Software development and Business analysis during his time studying there. He was introduced to the magical world of Technology by spending enough time coding and developing some of his school projects  and has been working towards his dream of becoming a software engineer ever since.

education.description: Relavant Course-work: analyzing of data using statistical tool and techniques

work.description: Design user interfaces,architect login structures,analyzing the systems and testing the systems, database integration and design and Writing system documentation,gathering system requirements and writing a daily report for Systems.
